ai-atk-vin02a13:1_2: For the various beings in the various classes of beings
ai-atk-vin02a13:1_3: but the four disciplinary issues resolved by the settling of legal issues.
ai-atk-vin02a13:1_4: Their senses were equipmented by the name of the aggregates and its constituents (of them) right there.
ai-atk-vin02a13:2_0: stones on the Monastic Law together in the Monastic Law.
ai-atk-vin02a13:3_0: The monks’ rules and their complexions is finished.
ai-atk-vin02a13:6_0: May the True Dhamma last long, (and) for a long time, for a long time,
ai-atk-vin02a13:7_0: Let the king protect yourselves! May the king protect yourselves!
ai-atk-vin02a13:8_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis is finished.
ai-atk-vin02a13:9_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
